sage.scene.state

Class TextureRecord

  • java.lang.Object
    • sage.scene.state.RenderStateRecord
      • sage.scene.state.TextureRecord

  • public class TextureRecord
extends RenderStateRecord
    TextureRecord holds a record of the state of a Texture object. The values maintained in the TextureRecord include
    • the S, T, and R wrap modes
    • the magnification and minification filter ids
    • the depthTextureMode, depthTextureFunction, and depthTextureCompareMode
    • the anisotropic filtering level
    • the border color
    Author:
    John Clevenger
